### Conflicts

#### Coverage

| Coverage  | Change ([pull 14653](https://drahtbot.github.io/reports/coverage/bitcoin/bitcoin/14653/to

Thanks, utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14653/commits/31066f523fc11ef8ba7943693180e56e04fd0bac\nThe `listsinceblock` RPC helptext also still refers to the 'move' category which was removed when accounts were, you could fix that up too in the same commit if you want :)
@promag Reformatted help docs, added tests for all rpcs that have transaction category.
@promag Are the formatting and tests ok?\n\n@MeshCollider Sorry to keep invalidating your utACKs. I updated to include category tests for all 3 rpcs.
This looks like it could be merged.
You could improve formatting by, for instance, following:\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/ae32806ea20235c4542b1a5d4011df5ae267b58a/src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp#L3017-L3023

I don't see the need to repeat. Something along this?
 ```
 "    "category"                    (string) The transaction category. One of
" 
 "        "send"                    transactions sent
"
 "        "receive"                 non-coinbase transations received
" 
...
```
However I don't have strong opinion here and currently there is no "standard" output defined (that I
